casebody.data:
CASE ANNOUNCEMENTS

October 23, 2009

[Cite as 10/23/2009 Case Announcements #2, 2009-Ohio-5611.]

MOTION AND PROCEDURAL RULINGS

2009-1292. State ex rel. Doner v. Logan.

In Mandamus. It is ordered by the court, sua sponte, pursuant to S.Ct.Prac.R. X(11), that a master commissioner is appointed for the limited purpose of receiving evidence and making all necessary determinations and rulings in regard thereto. All orders previously entered by the court in this case establishing deadlines for briefing and the submission of evidence are hereby stayed pending further order of the court.

Cupp, J., not participating.
